results.purpose: Q1 capitalization audit for tracking and verifying Key Results (KRs) that qualify for financial capitalization
key_data_points: Column G - Finance/Portfolio Decision on KR Capitalization
Column J - Check Questions (A, B, or C)
Column M - Percentage of capitalizable work YTD
Column AP - Tech Strategy input on OKR Management Tool

entities.name: Q1 capitalization audit
entities.context: Financial audit process for determining which Key Results can be capitalized as assets

entities.name: OKR Management Tool
entities.context: Tool where YP/QAR strategy and tech strategy inputs are tracked

entities.name: YP/QAR strategy
entities.context: Strategy framework that KRs must be associated with to demonstrate economic benefit

entities.name: KTLO
entities.context: Keep The Lights On activities that may still deliver benefit and create assets

insights: Three-step verification process required: alliance tab review, finance decision verification, and question-specific responses
Three types of questions (A, B, C) address different capitalization criteria: asset creation evidence, economic benefit mapping, and percentage accuracy of capitalizable work
System flags KRs with missing YP strategy, KTLO associations needing benefit mapping, or KRs not found in OKR Tool
Allows for challenging finance decisions with supporting commentary
Includes mechanism to correct reporting mistakes from previous months
Links capitalization eligibility to strategic alignment and economic benefit demonstration
